page.title: 08ENTERTAINMENT IN EPSOM
page.content: {In Epsom the only theatrical {entertainment is the Epsom Playhouse, attached to the Ashley Centre. There are 25 various entertainments shown each week in the 2 halls, such as amateur shows, snooker tournaments, films, plays, recitals of classical music, recitals of poetry, jazz, children's shows and discos. The most popular shows are those for children and all types of musical shows. For most performances attendance is between 55% and 60%, but does reach 90% for local amateur events. The busiest time of year is between October and Easter.{The only other {theatre nearby is the Adrian Mann {Theatre at NESCOT, the technical {college.
